snippet: Companies often focus too much on Web traffic and forget to work on turning that traffic into revenue.
abstract: Companies often focus too much on Web traffic and forget to work on turning that traffic into revenue; three proven ways are discussed to convert visitors to small business Web sites into customers.
lead_paragraph: Companies often focus too much on Web traffic and forget to work on turning that traffic into revenue.

headline.seo: Three Ways to Convert Web Visitors Into Buyers
headline.main: Three Proven Ways to Convert Visitors Into Buyers Online
headline.print_headline: Three Proven Ways To Convert Visitors Into Buyers Online
